pages.text: There are a few $(l:https://github.com/Mowmaster/Pedestals/wiki/Filtering-By-Entity)Upgrades/$ that determine their targets based on a block below them.$(li)Auto Attacker Upgrade$(li)Mob Fan Upgrade$(li)Potion Diffuser $(br)These Below Blocks are Supported:$(li)Netherite - Usually has special amplified effects.$(li)Emerald - Targets Players

$(li)Diamond - Targets Monsters (Zombies, Creepers, Skellies, Blaze, Most of your Hostile Mobs [But Not Slimes])$(li)Gold - Targets Animals (Horses, Pigs, Cows, Sheep, Most of your Passive Mobs)$(li)Lapis - Targets Flying Mobs (Bats, Phantoms)$(li)Iron - Targets Creatures (Monsters + Animals)$(li)Coal - Targets Mobs (Monsters + Animals + Flying)
